data.lore: Karthus is a harbinger of oblivion, zealously devoted to the beauty and clarity of death. Even in his youth, he was utterly obsessed with mortality, growing ever more relentless in the pursuit of his dark desires. Yearning to be one with death itself, Karthus journeyed to the Shadow Isles and willingly offered himself to undeath. Karthus transformed into the Deathsinger, a dread lich existing solely to deliver the blessed gift of annihilation.
data.name: Karthus
data.title: the Deathsinger

spells.tooltip: Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position. After 0.5 seconds, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy, this deals double damage if it hits only a single unit.
spells.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position. After 0.5 seconds, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy, this deals double damage if it hits only a single unit.
spells.name: Lay Waste
spells.sanitizedDescription: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

spells.tooltip: Creates a wall at target location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).
spells.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Creates a wall at target location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).
spells.name: Wall of Pain
spells.sanitizedDescription: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.

spells.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.
spells.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana. Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.
spells.name: Defile
spells.sanitizedDescription: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.

spells.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).
spells.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).
spells.name: Requiem
spells.sanitizedDescription: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.

passive.name: Death Defied
passive.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells while dead for 7 seconds.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells while dead for 7 seconds.
